mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.ValueNotApplicableProblem
mdProblem.label: Value not Applicable Problem
mdProblem.description: Value is not applicable on a mop-up spray

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.UniqueSprayException
mdException.label: Unique Spray Exception
mdException.description: A spray with the same spray date, spray location, spray method, insecticide brand already exists

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.UniqueOperatorSprayException
mdException.label: Unique Operator Spray Exception
mdException.description: An operator spray with the same spray date, spray location, spray method, insecticide brand, and spray operator already exists

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.UniqueTeamSprayException
mdException.label: Unique Team Spray Exception
mdException.description: A team spray with the same spray date, spray location, spray method, insecticide brand, and spray team already exists

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.UniqueZoneSprayException
mdException.label: Unique Zone Spray Exception
mdException.description: A zone spray with the same spray date, spray location, spray method, and insecticide brand already exists

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.ModifiedSprayMethodException
mdException.label: Modified Spray Method Exception
mdException.description: Spray Method cannot be modified when there are existing rows, because it may invalidiate some row data.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.ModifiedSprayTeamException
mdException.label: Modified Spray Team Exception
mdException.description: Spray Team cannot be modified when there are existing rows, because it will invalidate all row data.

mdException.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.ModifiedSprayZoneException
mdException.label: Modified Spray Zone Exception
mdException.description: Spray Method cannot be modified when there are existing rows, because it will invalidiate all row data.

mdProblem.name: dss.vector.solutions.irs.ValueNotApplicableProblem
mdProblem.label: Value not Applicable Problem
mdProblem.description: Value is not applicable on a mop-up spray
